trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> class.
This is the default constructor for this class.
Adds an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object.
Use this method to add an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> object to an existing collection at the current location.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object to add to the collection.
The index of the added <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object.
Copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object into an array.
This method copies an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection> object into an array at the specified location.
The array to copy the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object into.
The location where the copy operation starts.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> objects in a collection.
The number of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> objects in a collection.
Returns an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to navigate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidEnumerator> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface, which allows you to move within a collection.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidEnumerator"></xref> object.
Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object is thread safe.
This collection is not thread safe.
`false` in all cases.
Gets an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object.
Use this method to retrieve an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> object from an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection> object, if you know its location.

You can use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection.Item%2A> property to retrieve an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> object if you know the value of the object's <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.Value%2A> property or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FriendlyName%2A> property.
The location of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object in the collection.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object.

Gets the first <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object that contains a value of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.Value"></xref> property or a value of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FriendlyName"></xref> property that matches the specified string value from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object.

Use this property to retrieve an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> object from an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection> object if you know the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.Value%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FriendlyName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> object.
You can use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection.Item%2A> property to retrieve an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> object if you know its location in the collection.
A string that represents a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.Value"></xref> property or a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FriendlyName"></xref> property.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object.
<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection> is not thread safe.
Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection> class using this property.

The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection> object, not directly on the object itself.
This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might simultaneously be modifying the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection> object.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object.
Copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object into an array.
This method copies an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection> object into an array at the specified location.
The array to copy the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object to.
The location where the copy operation starts.
array cannot be a multidimensional array.
-or-
The length of array is an invalid offset length.
array is `null`.
The value of index is out range.
Returns an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to navigate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.OidEnumerator> class implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface, which allows you to move within a collection.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to navigate the collection.
